sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A 72-hour truce has been called in Sudan as EU nation-states begin evacuating its citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden is expected to formally confirm he will run for re-election in 2024, a potential rematch against old rival Donald Trump.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump's civil rape lawsuit begins in New York, a case brought against him by a journalist for allegedly sexually assaulting her in a department store in the 90s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Kosovar Albanians will govern the majority Serb regions in the north of the country after ethnic Serbs boycotted elections on Sunday and move endorsed by Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The first group of Italian citizens to be withdrawn from Sudan has arrived in Rome, at a time when a 72-hour truce has been confirmed by the two parties to the conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fighting between the regular army and a paramilitary group called the Rapid Support Forces has left at least 420 dead and around 3,700 wounded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Early Tuesday morning both parties confirmed via social media that a 72-hour truce that had been proposed by the United States had come into effect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Several countries around the world, including those of the European Union, are now withdrawing citizens who remain in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: According to the head of European diplomacy, Joseph Borre, EU member states have already managed to withdraw two-thirds of their nationals present in Sudan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That's around a thousand of the 1500 who were in the northeastern African nation when the conflict broke out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: France is also carrying out a delicate evacuation operation and is setting up a base in Djibouti to receive all displaced persons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres also promised that the United Nations will not abandon Sudan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Four more years. Speculation is intensifying that Joe Biden will today announce his bid to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: retain the US presidency. The 82-year-old has dropped several hints in recent weeks that he's poised to confirm his candidacy for the 2024 election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: So far, no significant Democratic rival has emerged to challenge him for the nomination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He's going to have to run on things about how he can steward us through these difficult times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The economy is better. We're out of COVID, not completely, but we're in a much better place.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Inflation rates are dropping. We're respected around the world in ways that we weren't before.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: These kinds of messages I expect to hear from a Biden candidacy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And I think he can readily run on those.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: An announcement would set the stage for an explosive rematch with Donald Trump, who is the frontrunner to become the Republican nominee.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: But it appears that's not what American voters want.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Polls consistently show people would prefer neither man to stand again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump is back under the legal spotlight as a civil lawsuit in which he is accused of rape begins in New York.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The proceedings will start with jury selection at the court in Manhattan. The case has been brought by US journalist E. Jean Carroll, who claims the former president raped her in a department store changing room in the city in the 1990s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Trump denies the charges, but his lawyers have indicated he will not appear in person in court to defend himself. As it's a civil case, Trump won't go to jail if found guilty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: But it could be politically damaging as testimony is likely to include a litany of allegations from Carol's legal team.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: For the first time since the post-war era of 1999, the four northern municipalities of Kosovo, inhabited by a majority of Serbs,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: will be led by leaders of the Albanian community, who are in a minority in these areas. On Sunday, Serbian parties and citizens boycotted elections there, a move officially encouraged by Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This has shown the great unity of the Serbian people, the discipline and responsibility of the Serbs, which is not seen in the modern history of our people, Serbs behaved not only nationally aware, conscientious and responsible, but they behaved as a very strong people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: According to journalist Zhamai Reza, the election proved very little and there were no winners.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This is not good for Kosovo as it would turn the attention towards crisis in the ground and not the bigger picture which is implementing the Brussels and then Ohrid agreements which in a way implies that Serbia will recognize Kosovo's right to exist.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However Kosovo's Prime Minister Alvin Curti does not share this perspective and has asked them to work in the interests of all citizens even the ethnic Serbs in the majority who boycotted the election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: in the majority who boycotted the election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: 200 light tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: That's the number of refurbished combat vehicles the Netherlands is sending to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: While Europe is second to the US in providing support packages to Kyiv, the EU's foreign policy chief Joseph Bure says military aid isn't getting to Ukraine fast enough.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: More than 1,000 missiles have been provided to Ukraine and a number of ammunition which is still growing, but it has to grow quicker in the next days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The second track, another billion, is being finalized by member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: There has been some disagreement, but the work continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We are not waiting for the legal document to be finished to start working.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: This same message was given by the Prime Minister of Estonia, Kaya Kalas, on her visit to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: She says she supports Kiev's NATO application.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: So for peace in Europe, we need Ukraine in the European Union. We for peace in Europe we need Ukraine in European Union we need Ukraine in NATO. This is also the message in this joint declaration we have just signed. This is also the reason why I suggested to the European Union that jointly procure 1 million artillery shells for Ukraine and sent them directly to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: In addition to munitions, EU member states and NGOs continue to send humanitarian aid, such as this charity in Riga, which was visited by the Estonian and Latvian First Ladies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It's here where aid packages are prepared for both Ukraine's defenders and civilians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Outlining the current Russian order of battle in Ukraine, the Institute for the Study of

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: War says Russian forces operating in decentralized and largely degraded formations throughout the theater.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And the current pattern of deployment suggests that most available units are already online and engaged in either offensive or defensive operations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The current Russian pattern of commitment around Bakhmut suggests that the Russian military leadership is increasingly prioritizing the completion of the capture of the city before the start of the Ukrainian counter-offensive, if possible. The Wagner Group continues to take heavy losses. It may well be able to complete seizure of the city at some point. Sustaining Wagner's advance beyond its culmination required the Russian Ministry of Defense to commit airborne forces formations on the northern and southwestern flanks to allow Wagner to concentrate almost entirely on the urban fight. In a rather stark contrast the Russian grouping in Kherson region is likely the most disorganized and undermanned in the entire theater.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian elements there have been reconstituted and redeployed after the Russian withdrawal from the West Bank of Kherson region in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Institute for the Study of War says it is highly likely that the remaining grouping on the East Bank is mainly comprised of badly understrength remnants of mainly mobilized units.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Over the weekend, the think tank said Russian mill bloggers have provided enough geolocated footage and textual reports to confirm that Ukrainian forces have established positions in the east bank of the Kherson region, though it's unclear at what scale or with what intentions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's Southern Command spokesperson Natalia Homenyuk said she could not confirm or reject the report since the conditions of a military operation require silence until it is safe enough for Ukrainian military.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Uproar in European capitals after comments by China's ambassador to France caused outrage when EU foreign ministers met in Luxembourg on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: has met in Luxembourg on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In a TV interview last Friday, Beijing's envoy appeared to question the sovereignty of Ukraine and other ex-Soviet states, which ruffled some feathers, especially in the Baltic countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This is clear that the Baltic states and Estonia, we are an independent, sovereign country, we are a member of the European Union, NATO, but I hope that there will be explanation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We are not post-Soviet countries, we're the countries that were illegally occupied by Soviet Union. China later walked back its envoys' remarks, but this diplomatic controversy comes at a very delicate moment in EU-China relations, given that Brussels is unhappy about Beijing's refusal to condemn Russia's invasion of Ukraine. China is promoting its own peace in the war, which is seen as biased and selective by Europe. to talk to Kyiv and to go there, to see the aggression through their eyes and through the eyes of those who are being bombed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The EU's top diplomat expressed confidence that the bloc would finalise a plan within days to buy ammunition for Ukraine after Kyiv expressed frustration at wrangling among EU member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Artillery rounds, particularly 155mm shells, have become critical to the conflict, as Ukrainian and Russian forces wage an intense war of attrition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Officials in Kiev say they're burning through more rounds than its allies can currently produce.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Russia has been accused of cynicism at the first session of the United Nations Security Council

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: since Moscow took over the presidency of the organization.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The meeting heard that the world is in a state of crisis, unprecedented since the foundation of the UN in 1945.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tensions between major powers are at an historic high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So are the risks of conflict through misadventure or miscalculation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia's invasion of Ukraine in violation of the United Nations Charter and international law is causing massive suffering and devastation to the country and its people and adding to the global economic dislocation triggered by the COVID-19 pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But Russia had a completely different take.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We again, as in the cold war, have come to a dangerous, and maybe even more dangerous, line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The situation is intensified by the loss of faith in multilateralism, when the financial and economic aggression of the West destroys the benefits of globalization, when Washington and its allies refuse diplomacy and demand a clear relationship on the battlefield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: All this is in the UN walls, created to prevent the horrors of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Accusing Moscow of cynicism, the head of the EU delegation said that by calling the meeting, Russia was trying to portray itself as a defender of the UN Charter, but that nothing could be further from the truth.
